verses.verse: וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <S%H7999><s%> was finished כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> Thus all the work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> made שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> that Solomon לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> brought שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָדְשֵׁ֣י ׀ <S%H6944><s%> had dedicated דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> that David אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <S%H3627><s%> and all the instruments נָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> put בְּאֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> he among the treasures בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God פ

אָז֩ <S%H227><s%> Then יַקְהֵ֨יל <S%H6950><s%> assembled שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> and all the heads הַמַּטּ֜וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes נְשִׂיאֵ֧י <S%H5387><s%> the chief הָאָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> which צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> which [is] Zion

וַיִּקָּהֲל֧וּ <S%H6950><s%> assembled אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> themselves unto the king כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Wherefore all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֶּחָ֑ג <S%H2282><s%> in the feast ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> which [was] in the seventh

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <S%H935><s%> came כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> And all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> took up הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> the ark

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> the ark וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> vessels הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and all the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> that [were] in the tabernacle הֶעֱל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> bring up אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> these did the priests הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> [and] the Levites

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Also king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַנּוֹעָדִ֥ים <S%H3259><s%> that were assembled עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> with לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> unto him before הָאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark מְזַבְּחִים֙ <S%H2076><s%> sacrificed צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> and oxen אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> could יִסָּפְר֛וּ <S%H5608><s%> which could not be told וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִמָּנ֖וּ <S%H4487><s%> nor numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> brought in הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמ֛וֹ <S%H4725><s%> unto his place אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1687><s%> to the oracle הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> into the most הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כַּנְפֵ֥י <S%H3671><s%> [place even] under the wings הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <S%H3742><s%> of the cherubims

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <S%H3742><s%> For the cherubims פֹּרְשִׂ֣ים <S%H6566><s%> spread forth כְּנָפַ֔יִם <S%H3671><s%> [their] wings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> over the place הָאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> of the ark וַיְכַסּ֧וּ <S%H3680><s%> covered הַכְּרוּבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> and the cherubims עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> and the staves מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> thereof above

וַֽיַּאֲרִיכוּ֮ <S%H748><s%> And they drew out הַבַּדִּים֒ <S%H905><s%> the staves וַיֵּרָאוּ֩ <S%H7200><s%> were seen רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> [of the ark] that the ends הַבַּדִּ֤ים <S%H905><s%> of the staves מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> from the ark עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַדְּבִ֔יר <S%H1687><s%> the oracle וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> could יֵרָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> but they were not seen הַח֑וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> without וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> are there עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And there it is unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

אֵ֚ין <S%H369><s%> There בָּֽאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> [There was] nothing in the ark רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> save the two הַלֻּח֔וֹת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> put מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <S%H2722><s%> [therein] at Horeb אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where כָּרַ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [a covenant] with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> when they came out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt פ

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> were come out הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> And it came to pass when the priests מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> [place] (for all the priests הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֙ <S%H4672><s%> [that were] present הִתְקַדָּ֔שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> were sanctified אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> without לִשְׁמ֥וֹר <S%H8104><s%> [and] did not [then] wait לְמַחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <S%H4256><s%> by course

וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> Also the Levites הַמְשֹׁרֲרִ֣ים <S%H7891><s%> [which were] the singers לְכֻלָּ֡ם <S%H3605><s%> and all לְאָסָ֡ף <S%H623><s%> all of them of Asaph לְהֵימָ֣ן <S%H1968><s%> of Heman לִֽ֠ידֻתוּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H1121><s%> with their sons וְלַאֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren מְלֻבָּשִׁ֣ים <S%H3847><s%> [being] arrayed בּ֗וּץ <S%H948><s%> in white linen בִּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4700><s%> having cymbals וּבִנְבָלִ֣ים <S%H5035><s%> and psalteries וְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and harps עֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> stood מִזְרָ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> at the east end לַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְעִמָּהֶ֤ם <S%H5973><s%> with כֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> priests לְמֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> and with them an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty [מַחְצְרִרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֖ים <S%H2690><s%> blow ק) בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֽוֹת׃ <S%H2689><s%> trumpets

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כְ֠אֶחָד <S%H259><s%> [were] as one [לַמַּחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (לַמְחַצְּרִ֨ים <S%H2690><s%> blow ק) וְלַמְשֹֽׁרֲרִ֜ים <S%H7891><s%> and singers לְהַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> sound אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> to make one לְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> in praising וּלְהֹדוֹת֮ <S%H3034><s%> and thanking לַיהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּכְהָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> and when they lifted up ק֠וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [their] voice בַּחֲצֹצְר֨וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with the trumpets וּבִמְצִלְתַּ֜יִם <S%H4700><s%> and cymbals וּבִכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> and instruments הַשִּׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> of musick וּבְהַלֵּ֤ל <S%H1984><s%> and praised לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [saying] For [he is] good כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy וְהַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> that [then] the house מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> was filled עָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> with a cloud בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [even] the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽכְל֧וּ <S%H3201><s%> could הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> So that the priests לַעֲמ֥וֹד <S%H5975><s%> not stand לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> by reason הֶעָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> had filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> for the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God פ
